thesis.summary: Elliott Management (Tier-1) $1B+ stake demanding CEO replacement (Jane Nielsen for Calvin McDonald). Thesis is operational turnaround and brand cleanup.

decision.rationale: Score 10.5 > 8.25. High conviction Tier-1 activist campaign on high-quality asset trading at compressed valuation.

thesis_break_triggers: Board rejects all demands and wins proxy fight definitively
